reviews.review_msg: knows her stuff and she's not only speaks about theory... but about things that happened, are in the news, tangible. She's travelled the world as a researcher, interviewed incredible people, etc, etc... completely worth it. If you like discussion and generous marking... she's the one!
Knows his stuff. He's tough, but you learn much from him. Dont take it expecting an easy A, but do expect to learn something.
